todos.title: Consistently structured communication (Identify or repeating issue, scope of what we will do to help, how and frequency of communication, next steps, further help).  I like more informal correspondence that still hits the main topics.
Delivered above and beyond expectations (surprised us with some added value that we did not expect)
Gave us a way to see progress throughout the project
Properly formatted, no typos or slang, proper use of indentations, bullets
